name: I just had a moment joking around w/ Colette. A simple smile. A wink. My silly little girl. That's all it took for my heart to soar.

content.html: I just had a moment joking around w/ Colette. A simple smile. A wink. My silly little girl. That's all it took for my heart to soar.
